required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinal Evaluation of Navigation Based Functional Ear Surgery Using Image Guided and Robotically Assisted Techniques
clinical_study.official_title: Clinal Evaluation of Navigation Based Functional Ear Surgery Using Image Guided and Robotically Assisted Techniques

brief_summary.textblock: To assess the feasibility of achieving a minimally invasive access to the inner ear through the navigation-based HEARO procedure and subsequently insert the electrode array of the cochlear implant through the access.

detailed_description.textblock:
- Demonstrate the feasibility and efficacy of performing a middle and inner ear access for cochlear implantation procedures in adults.
- Validate the procedure workflow including imaging, planning, safety assessment, image to patient registration, robotic drilling, electrode insertion and device implantation.
- Validate the system and procedure safety mechanisms.
- Collect required data for validation of safety algorithms and procedure workflow optimisation.
- Validate the HEARO system.

primary_outcome.measure: The relative ratio of successfully completed procedures where a direct access tunnel was drilled to the cochlea with the HEAROÂ® system and the electrode was conventionally inserted through the tunnel.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Image data aquired during the procedure

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of completed middle ear access
Number of completed inner ear access

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Image data aquired during the procedure

secondary_outcome.measure: Sensitivity and specificity of facial nerve monitoring

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Image data aquired during the procedure
secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of the insertion depth of the electrode into the Cochlea

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of complication events on (temporary) facial nerve palsy, pre and post bleeding and infection

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Image data aquired during the procedure

arm_group.arm_group_label: Minimally invasive robotic cochlear implantation with HEARO

intervention.arm_group_label: Minimally invasive robotic cochlear implantation with HEARO

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients suffering from profound sensorineural deafness requiring a Cochlear implant
Exclusion Criteria:
- Age under 18 years
- Pregnant women
- Anatomical anomalies of temporal bone
- Chronic otitis media with or without cholesteatoma
